chunk:
Burt's Bees  Sensitive Gentle Facial Cleanser

Brand: Burt's Bees

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: WATER, DECYL GLUCOSIDE, LAURYL GLUCOSIDE, GLYCERIN, CETYL ALCOHOL, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, SODIUM STEAROYL LACTYLATE, STEARIC ACID, XANTHAN GUM, COCO-GLUCOSIDE, BETAINE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, CITRIC ACID, GLYCERYL OLEATE, SODIUM CHLORIDE, TOCOPHEROL, HYDROGENATED PALM GLYCERIDES CITRATE, LECITHIN, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SODIUM BENZOATE,

XANTHAN GUM, COCO-GLUCOSIDE, BETAINE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, CITRIC ACID, GLYCERYL OLEATE, SODIUM CHLORIDE, TOCOPHEROL, HYDROGENATED PALM GLYCERIDES CITRATE, LECITHIN, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SODIUM BENZOATE, ASCORBYL PALMITATE, PHENOXYETHANOL
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
